item.title: students leveled up real quick
item.description: 17:47 Wednesday 06 December 2017 JST At my third of three kids classes here at JB, we had a new student, 4 or 5 years older than the others. The two previously-oldest girls in the class suddenly stopped messing around and tried significantly harder than usual. Such a nice change of pace! I used a technique I learned from Tariq: keep having them switch conversation partners and repeat the same conversation with a new partner.

item.title: last class for B-group
item.description: 18:52 Wednesday 17 June 2015 JST Today was the last class for the B-group. Takahiro informed me as he came in. I had heard it would be ending soon but didn’t know today was the day. They requested “small talk” so I invited each person in turn to ask another “how was your weekend?” and I made corrections as appropriate.

item.title: AM Thursday class
item.description: 07:04 Thursday 04 June 2015 JST Headed to Kawasaki station 09:00 Class was as great as possible with three students arriving at three different times! (one of whom hasn’t attended in so long that I had forgotten his name)

item.title: Good time in Japanese class
item.description: 22:43 Wednesday 03 June 2015 JST Just attended Japanese class in 80’s Cafe. It’s the third time リサさん has attended, and the third time I’ve sat next to her. I like her piercings and smile. :-) Today she asked me if it rained much in Houston, and I showed her the pictures of recent flooding there. I actually didn’t really know just how bad (and quickly) it flooded. wow. I hope everyone is okay, though I know flood damage suuucckks.
